text:
FEDERAL COMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION
WASHINGTON 25, D. C.
ADDRESS ALL COMMUNICATIONS
TO THE SECRETARY
August 29, 1952
IN REPLY REFER TO:
Dear Mr* Ausmus:
Thank you for your very gracious letter
of the 25th inst. I appreciate what you say about my
contribution to the Iowa State College Television
Workshop*
The additional copies of the speech
which you requested are being mailed to you today.
With kind regards, I am
Chairman
Graydon Ausmus, Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
WUOA-FM
Box 2002
University, Alabama
